message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I think you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its unique features and benefits, I'm offering it at a starting price of $14,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $15,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $13,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position and I'm keen on making this work.  While $13,000 is a bit too low for me, I could meet you halfway. How about $13,500?
